title: Exposing 'The Swamp'?  - 4/5/18
description:
Hour 1
School shooting averted?...concerned citizens, capable law enforcement both doing their part ...Migrant caravan scraps plans to charge the US border...who's funding these caravans?...yep, you guessed right: George Soros...has his fingers all over everything ...America has seen these type of radicals before...same old revolution ...Creator and executive producer of 'The Swamp' Matt Whitworth joins Glenn to discuss his new documentary series that follows 4 members of the House Freedom Caucus...here’s how Washington works in one sentence...risky filmmaking...Top-down nature of Washington, D.C...our country is dying within...Watch 'The Swamp' at Facebook.com/theswamp ...The 'other' David Hogg?...he tells his story to the Wall Street Journal...polar opposite opinions...listen more and talk less 

 

Hour 2 
Trump and troops make the media go crazy...the National Guard called to secure the border…remember when Obama did the same thing?...here are 3 times when that’s happened; what do they have in common? ...It's a Happy-Go-Lucky Bill O'Reilly Thursday...Bill says he's right once again about the border?...What President Trump is doing on the border is right...The idiocy of whiteness...Bill discusses the latest news about him losing his motion to seal sexual harassment settlement agreements...What's President Trump's next move? ...Snorting condoms with Stu?...remember getting your friends to snort milk? Yeah, this isn’t that

 

Hour 3
Unethical giving…Wisconsin Planned Parenthood fined for not reporting political donations...Where's all the money to fund Planned Parenthood coming from?...Stu debunks a popular liberal talking point about guns…the government would have a lot more trouble ‘rolling over’ an armed populace...Glenn is mourning with Jennifer Garner...the chicken diaper elite?... ‘chicken consultants’ can help you keep your chicken happy...Glenn is starting to question things about his childhood?...rice and raisins =/= rice pudding ...Will Jeffy eat it?...Bacon and cheese crickets...Mexican spice larva...'not bad, taste like chips' ... ‘don’t just eat the head’?? ...Attention all 18 to 25 year olds, Glenn needs your help got to (mercuryone.org/ltp)
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
